name: Web Sentence Analyzer
description: Fetches a webpage, extracts and analyzes sentences, providing frequency counts and statistics. Useful for content analysis, SEO research, and text mining from web sources.
author: Plugin System User

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: Website URL
inputs.help: Enter the full URL of the webpage you want to analyze (must include http:// or https://)

inputs.name: max_sentences
inputs.label: Maximum Sentences to Return
inputs.help: Limit the number of sentences in the results (default: 50)

inputs.name: min_sentence_length
inputs.label: Minimum Sentence Length
inputs.help: Filter out sentences shorter than this number of characters (default: 10)

output.name: webSentenceAnalysis
output.description: Comprehensive analysis of sentences found on the webpage

most_common_sentences.description: List of sentences sorted by frequency

frequency.description: How many times this sentence appears

total_text_length.description: Total character count of extracted text

average_sentence_length.description: Average length of sentences in characters
